section.name: How I can conctact the authors
section.p: You can contact the authors of Corsen by mail or using the the Corsen group on Google group.

section.name: How can I contribute to Corsen?
section.p: Corsen is a free software project. Everybody is encouraged to contribute to Corsen. There are lots of ways in which you can help to continue Corsen:

ul.li: Submitting bug reports to the issue tracker

section.p: There are several places to look for more information if you want to get involved in the development. The first step is to subscribe to the Corsen group. You will soon see something that can be improved or added.

section.name: How do I commit a bug report?
section.p: As Corsen code is hosting by Google, you can use the issue tracker bind to our project.

section.name: How do I get access to the code repository ?
section.p: The Corsen project uses the Subversion system to develop the core parts of the software. To facilitate contributions to our project, Corsen code is hosted by Google code hosting. You can freely access to the main page of the project and to the subversion repository.
